# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, I propose a special introductory price of $75 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available after today. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at an attractive price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
